methods.name: public Builder setPublicBroadcast(boolean isPublicBroadcast)
methods.comment:
* Set whether the Public Broadcast is on for this broadcast group.
         *
         * @param isPublicBroadcast whether the Public Broadcast is enabled
         * @return this builder
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setBroadcastName(@Nullable String broadcastName)
methods.comment:
* Set broadcast name for the broadcast group. * *

As defined in Public Broadcast Profile V1.0, section 5.1. Broadcast_Name AD Type is a * UTF-8 encoded string containing a minimum of 4 characters and a maximum of 32 * human-readable characters. * * @param broadcastName Broadcast name for this broadcast group, null if no name provided * @throws IllegalArgumentException if name is non-null and its length is less than 4 * characters or greater than 32 characters * @return this builder * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setBroadcastCode(@Nullable byte[] broadcastCode)
methods.comment:
* Set the Broadcast Code currently set for this broadcast group. * *

Only needed when encryption is enabled As defined in Volume 3, Part C, Section 3.2.6 * of Bluetooth Core Specification, Version 5.3, Broadcast Code is used to encrypt a * broadcast audio stream. It must be a UTF-8 string that has at least 4 octets and should * not exceed 16 octets. * * @param broadcastCode Broadcast Code for this broadcast group, null if code is not * required for non-encrypted broadcast * @throws IllegalArgumentException if name is non-null and its length is less than 4 * characters or greater than 16 characters * @return this builder * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setPublicBroadcastMetadata(@Nullable BluetoothLeAudioContentMetadata publicBroadcastMetadata)
methods.comment:
* Set public broadcast metadata for this Broadcast Group. PBS should include the
         * Program_Info length-type-value (LTV) structure metadata
         *
         * @param publicBroadcastMetadata public broadcast metadata for this Broadcast Group, null
         *     if no public meta data provided
         * @return this builder
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder addSubgroupSettings(@NonNull BluetoothLeBroadcastSubgroupSettings subgroupSettings)
methods.comment:
* Add a subgroup settings to the broadcast group.
         *
         * @param subgroupSettings contains subgroup's setting data
         * @return this builder
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder clearSubgroupSettings()
methods.comment:
* Clear subgroup settings list so that one can reset the builder
         *
         * @return this builder
         * @hide

methods.name: public BluetoothLeBroadcastSettings build()
methods.comment:
* Build {@link BluetoothLeBroadcastSettings}.
         *
         * @return {@link BluetoothLeBroadcastSettings}
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the object cannot be built
         * @hide
